definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Collapse distribution centres on the intensive runoff zones.
sentences.chinese: 在地下水強徑流帶，塌陷分佈較爲密集。

sentences.english: The runoff has the catabatic effect to acidification of water quality.
sentences.chinese: 地表徑流對水質的酸化有緩衝作用。

sentences.english: The major control factor of water quality is precipitation and runoff.
sentences.chinese: 降雨和徑流爲三亞灣海域水質參數變化的控制因子。

sentences.english: The yearly uneven degree of runoff distribution in Yulin River Catchment was deeper than Xinlin River Catchment.
sentences.chinese: 育林溝的年內徑流分配不均勻程度比新林溝大。

sentences.english: Consequently, urban storm runoff has a large impact on the water environment.
sentences.chinese: 因此，珠海城區暴雨徑流對水環境的威脅較大。

sentences.english: Surface runoff of the watershed mainly originates from the high mountain region of the Qilian Nountain.
sentences.chinese: 疏勒河流域地表徑流主要形成於高山區。

sentences.english: The difference of the above two means the storm water accumulation at each runoff catchment area.
sentences.chinese: 兩者之差就是城市各雨水徑流流域暴雨的積水量。

sentences.english: Meridional flow problems in radial flow turbo-machinery are solved by using the method of boundary elements.
sentences.chinese: 採用邊界元法求解徑流式葉輪機械子午流動問題。

sentences.english: Rainwater is collected from the roof runoff and recycled as gray water for the irrigation system.
sentences.chinese: 收集的雨水從屋頂徑流和再生水的灰色的灌溉系統。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the concept and the method of calculating installation sequential capacity for run-of-river hydropower stations.
sentences.chinese: 提出了徑流式水電站安裝時序容量的概念和計算方法。

sentences.english: So, new theory and methods are being urgently needed for the study on the rainfall-runoff forecasting.
sentences.chinese: 因此，降雨徑流的研究迫切需要引入新的理論和方法。

sentences.english: In this paper a nonuniform coefficient for quantifying the nonuniformity in annual distribution of stream flows is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種河川徑流年內分配不均勻性的定量化方法。

sentences.english: An approach of regulating runoffs and integrated management in small watersheds should be adopted.
sentences.chinese: 貫徹徑流調控和綜合治理路線，搞好小流域綜合防治。

sentences.english: Reduced runoff is increasing the pressure on freshwater resources in Africa.
sentences.chinese: 河流的徑流量減少正增加非洲地區淡水資源的壓力。

sentences.english: Basically, as soil surface roughness increase, the runoff coefficient and runoff rate decrease.
sentences.chinese: 地表糙度與產流率和徑流係數有着一定的相關性。

sentences.english: The slope runoff formed by soil erosion is two-phase flow constituted by water and sand.
sentences.chinese: 土壤侵蝕所形成的坡面徑流是水沙液固兩相流。

definition: Guangchang county in Fuzhou 撫州|抚州, Jiangxi
